creator: spam_from_apache_bugzilla@chezphil.org
text:
It would be great if apxs could give an appropriate response to "apxs --version".

I'm asking for this after a moment of confusion during some remote debugging
when I was unsure if the user really had Apache 2.x as they claimed or Apache
1.x (they were getting mysterious errors from apxs).  If apxs had had a
--version flag it would have been much quicker to solve.  (Ideally this would be
added in both the 2.x and 1.x branches.)

Thanks, Phil.

"httpd -V" will already report the server version, I'm not sure what the value
in duplicating that would be really.
